comments:
Build id: I20050927-0800

I got this error while debugging... afterwards the variables view would no
longer show anything.  After killing and restarting my debugged application
everything went back to normal.

Plan to replace variables view with new implementation in 3.2 M4. Will address 
this bug indirectly.
Marking as won't fix as the variables view no longer uses a jface TreeViewer.
